website_summaries.verdict: A single D-ring that attaches to your Jeep, it's very strong and has a rubber insert component to prevent rattling.
pros: This ring does not rattle like some other rings do
cons: Weight capacity isn't as high as some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: They looked good at first, but after a couple of weeks and some rain the bolts and shackles started to rust.
customer_reviews.author: SQC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look very good on the 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: These not only look great, they are solid. Rated for 58,000 pounds. They are worth the money, in fact, I think they’re worth more once I got them. Nice packaging and they donate to ST. Jude’s hospital. I ordered 2 sets because I have one hook in the rear of my 4Runner, so now I have 1 extra as a spare
customer_reviews.author: Mark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Inspect for defects in paint on arrival
customer_reviews.text: ***edit!**** - they sent me a new pair of shackles die to the initial finish and these were perfect. Outstanding customer service! Not all that impressed with initial finish quality. Paint has smear in it as if it were put in the box or handled while still wet/tacky. Was pleased with gaskets that were provided. Ultimately not super upset with finish knowing these will get used and abused. That's the only thing from me not giving a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: jayson p.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty D Rings and they come with the rubber spacers and bumpers to keep them from rattling or marking up your your Bumper. bright Orange, love the way they look on the jeep. I used a zip tie to secure the screw pin after installing, just as a safety precaution to keep them from loosening or falling off the jeep while driving.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Kahler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product & packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Really work well on my aftermarket front and rear bumpers! Nice powder coat finish and everything lined up nicely for me. The green color is vibrant without being too annoying...which is exactly what I was looking for when I bought two sets of these! The pictures on Amazon do well represent the actual color. And their support of a reputable charity is just icing on the cake for me. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sparke5503

customer_reviews.title: Lost one - but good
customer_reviews.text: These looked great on my Jeep. I did have one fly off on the highway even though I felt like they were extremely secure. The one complaint that I have is how quickly they fade. I live in upstate NY and they have faded so much in only 4 to 6 months. I couldn't imagine what they look like after a few months in states with a lot of sun. I probably will not spend the money to replace the missing one, but the concept is nice.
customer_reviews.author: VanidieS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and look amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give my ride a better look as well as providing access points in case I never need recovery. The shackles are sent in a box with pre-cut foam that fits perfectly around each shackle. You have 6 total washers (rubber type material) per shackle. This allows you for a snug fit on each recovery hook as well as keeping the shackles in place and not allowing them to make any noise. Installation is easy even for one person. I used threadlock just to make sure that the pin on the shackle does not come loose. The look of them really pops and each shackle is a work of art. Highly recommend for anyone looking at these.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: Strongest shackles I've EVER seen
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredible!! First off, the box was very heavy for its small size. A GREAT sign when buying a steel product you want to be strong. Once I opened them I could immediately tell that they're a quality product. Super sturdy, thick metal with a nice gloss black finish. They also come with rubber washers to keep the shackles from rattling if you mount them on your rig. Can't wait to test these things out. I know they'll hold up to anything!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Had some issues
customer_reviews.text: Ok a few things. What I did not like, the end that threads into the bolt screws in the wrong direction. The threads have coating on them so I couldn't even get 1/2 a turn on it. The triangle key is piss poor for putting the cap on. Going to have my mechanic put them on. I have no doubt it's a strong as they say. But it shouldn't be that complicated to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Poor paint BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The look of these was what I was looking for but who ever inspects the final product needs to wear glasses. I ordered 2 sets of these shackles in red and all 4 of them have paint missing. They have great warranty on there products but I shouldn't have to use it before I even put them on my vehicle. Will be returning both sets. I was really looking forward to have them on my truck but now I must go with a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Ham Sup Lo

customer_reviews.title: Quality company and product.
customer_reviews.text: Look rugged and good price. Only thing is I wish they were a red, red. They're a little on the orange side, which (as dumb as it sounds considering its purpose and what it's going on) clashes with my red Jeep. As they would with any red accent. They are of high quality and I do like that they give a portion of profits to St Jude. Packaged very well with some good literature. I'm sure I'll be ordering something from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best Drings out there. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This things are beast! You can tell just by the weight that they will hold up. It was a PIA to get the rimubver washers squished in their and get the ring on at the same time. Finally did and they don't budge at all. Even went offeaoding this weekend and my entire bumper moved but the DRings strayed right where I put then. Awesome product. Will be buying more for the front soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tangney

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with one of two shackle's pin. It was not fit into the lifting lug. I've tried that in both lugs but no luck... Another pin is ok on any lug. Customer service responded fast and offer me to send new pin... never got it... can't give you more than 1 star so far...
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great shackle
customer_reviews.text: Well the last of my shackles either fell off, or was stolen from my Jeep. I set out to find a quality replacement when I found these. These are incredibly sturdy feeling and I like that they included any vibration/rattle washers. The biggest selling point to these for me were the anti theft feature. I like the ability to secure these but it would be nice if 2 keys were included instead of just the one. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JeepJunkie

customer_reviews.title: These things are beefy and tough!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with my new shackles. The paint on them is great and fully covers it, so no worries about rust. They are super beefy and sturdy. I really like that the edges are all soft so you will not ruin any snatch straps or tow straps with these high quality shackles. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, thick HD shackles
customer_reviews.text: There are super HD looking. Haven’t pulled anything with them yet but if my el-cheapo HaborFreght shackles can pull F-350s for miles, I’m sure these will do great. I had to move them to the rear of my vehicle however as they are took thick for the standard HF badland winch hook to easily hook onto without too much effort. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavy, sexy
customer_reviews.text: Due to the configuration of my bumper the installation was a pain in the ass but like I said that was more of how my bumper is built and not the shackles. They have good weight to them and the extra washer allowed to snug these babies up to keep the rattle at a minimum. I have not had to use these yet for a recovery but I will update my review if and when that happens. Don’t mind the photo. I still have more lights to install. Ha ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Zook

customer_reviews.title: Update: terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. No more banging around with plain shackles 8/27/2020 edit: I liked these up until today. Constantly had to tighten them and today one fell off so now I have to spend more money and replace it. Absolutely ridiculous! 8/29/20 customer service is good! Issued a replacement. This time to be safe i think I will use blue locktite on the threads. Ive bumped my review to 3 stars until I receive the new shackles. I'll update later.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to mount to the front & rear of my Jeep. They are fantastic looking forgings! The paint looks pretty robust, and it comes with rubber silencing washers that mount between the eye and the sides of the shackle! I've got these hanging off an off-road stubby jeep bumper and they really look amazing! VERY glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Reece

customer_reviews.title: First Class Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shackles and when I opened the package noticed that some one of the shackles was without the isolator and the washers. I emailed the company and they immediately sent out replacements, as well as offering a discount on further products, which I'll definitely use. The shackles themselves are as advertised, and fit my truck/tow straps perfectly. Couldn't recommend Gear America any more highly.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong. Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Should get ten stars!!! Very study and solid product. Lots of compliments on these!! And they very generously donate to a charity that’s dear to me!! Best Company I Have Dealt With!
customer_reviews.author: ThinBlueLine_JKU

customer_reviews.title: Powder coat sucks
customer_reviews.text: Shackles are heavy duty but the powder coat sucks! We got these in green and after being installed for 2 months they are faded bad. My Jeep is not a daily driver and is garaged so this only happened with a few afternoons of my garage door being open. I couldn’t imagine what they would look like if not garaged and a daily driver! I emailed the company but no reply. Figures. Any company that don’t have their phone number listed on their website is shady. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Karen Morris

customer_reviews.title: Tough and secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the anti-theft feature. The screw was difficult to install in my bumper because I needed more clearance to get the triangle tool in to tighten it. I contacted the company to try and get a low profile right-angle triangle driver but never heard back. I was able to use a low profile allen wrench instead and love the look and security of these shackles.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Clawson III

customer_reviews.title: Not Many Companies Produce Lime Green Products
customer_reviews.text: Build Quality Seems Solid, matches the color scheme of my truck perfectly. Wish they came with a set of the rubber chain guards (Used the red ones from my last set). Other users reported rust and paint dulling after a short period. Will update the review if anything goes wrong. Will be purchasing a set for the front bumper soon. A+ so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Goodman

customer_reviews.title: impressed with the packaging
customer_reviews.text: These look great, quality build, impressed with the packaging. Don't have to worry about these bad boys getting damaged during shipment. Good product, everything fits (plenty of rubber washers) and works as it should. I like the Anti Theft Lock feature. Installed along with Demon Hook Brackets. Toyota Tacoma 2020
customer_reviews.author: QBagcal

customer_reviews.title: Locking D shackles
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted these D Ring shackles but ended up getting a pair for 25 dollars. Needless to say those shackles fell off after two fishing trips. I got these because they had a triangle lock so they wouldn’t fall off my rig. Only time will tell if they last but so far they are worth my money!
customer_reviews.author: Abe B.

customer_reviews.title: Best shackle ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these D rings these are awesome. I've been recovered a few times with them and I've also recovered several vehicles with them personally myself. I'm in a 2012 Jeep Wrangler with some aftermarket modifications. They were packaged very well awesome shape no dings no nicks. I love the blue they match up well with all my other blue accents
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Confident it was the right choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen reviews about the color being off, or paint being poorly applied. I noticed none of that. Instead I thought they were over packed. I’ve actually purchased watches that were less well packaged. From the reviews I was concerned. But i’ve received compliments on their appearance and have used them pulling vehicles that were buried in sand. Not the most demanding task, but it was successful.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of shackles!
customer_reviews.text: I believe these will make a strong point of connecting.. seen some saying rust has started from scratches, but that is to be expected ... if mine get surface rust then it's ok with me.. rust will never weakened this metal,,. We're looking at the most important thing,, strength!! I own other Gear American products and am very happy with there products!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: They will get loose and fall off so check them weekly .
customer_reviews.text: They look great but they are always coming g loose . I cranked the locking lug down and still would get loose. The rubber washer they use break down pretty quick . Lost one yesterday after not even a year a the truck. If you get them check them constantly or they will get loose and fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy and Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: The shackles are badass next level. Really Impressed the company gives St Judes Hospital 10 % of sales Perplexed and Frustrated because right on the box it says Designed in USA then Made in PRC. MADE IN PRC (PEOPLES REPUBLIC OF CHINA) I realize the company is in the business of making money. Com'on GearAmerica we would happily pay even more $$ if these were made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: John Sleigher

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how these will work as I'm just a poser, but they look great on the front of my 4Runner. I picked this kit as it came with a good number of rubber shims to isolate rattles. Awesome packaging, rings and items were perfect. Also they support a good cause with a portion of their sales.
customer_reviews.author: MStarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking finish
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been in a situation where I have needed these yet. Finnish looks great, I purchased the red ones hoping that they would stand out better if dropped in mud, water etc... I have a synthetic rope winch so the rubber guard should work great.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Rednek

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I ordered two sets!
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Just opening the boxes felt like quality. The D shackles are well made and solid. The rubber spacers included, keep them from rattling about, especially off road. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Stand out
customer_reviews.text: Shakles are fantastic. warning though. don't just stick washers in to silence shackle. washers come in different size thickness. this was very helpful because mounts on back bumper on my jeep are different than my front bumper. this was great thinking on manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: David Preston Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Tough, very aggressive looking! A+
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something more aggressive looking than typical D-rings and wow, these more than fit the bill! Very heavy and rugged design, I don't see these giving up under typical or even heightened pulling duress. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: XOMBIE

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and easy to see!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific price, delivered on time and nicer than pictures. These are exactly what I was looking for to help in my logging and tree moving needs. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SAMitchell

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, the anti-theft feature is a plus. Rubber washers keep it tight and rattle free but pain on the butt to put its on for a real tight fit. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit and Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Prefect Fit and extremely Heavy Duty. I had a large tree down and needed a safe way to get it out of the way. Put these on the rear bumper of my truck, attached a tow chain, put the truck in 4wheeldrive and off we went. If you need a great and heavy D-Link these are the ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Shackles seem like good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Shackles have a great design, but they are definitely large. The fit is good as far as the bolt is concerned so long as you have 1" openings. The fitment for the reverse threaded locker could be better. And if your receivers aren't perfectly 90 degrees out from your bumper you may have troubles using the key to get them installed or to remove them. I haven't had them installed for long. I'll update the review if there are any issues with rust.
customer_reviews.author: QuantumLock

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shackles they have all the rubber washers and bushings to keep them from rattling and scratching your bumpers finish! Look great can’t wait to try them out on the trails!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Conley

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and tough looking!
customer_reviews.text: These look way better than classic d rings. They are very heavy and well built. The washers keep them in place. They don't rattle even on rough roads. I'll buy more in the future for my rear bumper. I'd recommend these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RobG

customer_reviews.title: GearAmerica Mega Duty D Ring Shackles Red (2PK) | 68000 lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is for the red 34ton shackles only. These things are nice, they look high quality and are heavy. Very well finished and they come with various size washers. Hope to never "need" them, but if I do, I won't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: SardonickTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These shackles are huge, probably too big for what I would use them for but I’m going to keep them anyway. I have no doubt they could hold up to what they are advertised to. Will update once I use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Less accurate description, missing keyed lock
customer_reviews.text: These shackles/ clevis’/ loops look great but they are advertised as 40T. That is the minimum break strength not working load limit. (As most all towing/ rigging equip is) Package arrived in great shape but as you can see from the picture, they don’t have the security lock key. (Tri corner drive) Also, I had ordered red. (That’s not a big deal though) Now I have to go out of my way to return the package with a missing piece. Rating is based off no use as of this moment.
customer_reviews.author: Dmax lml

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the tow hitch and two D-rings and I’m pretty pleased with the product. Definitely appears to be extremely well made and sturdy. I’ve only had them for a week and haven’t had the opportunity to actually use them, I’m pretty confident they’ll hold up just fine. They actually send you a couple different size isolators for your D-rings, which is awesome because that’ll ensure you won’t have any vibrations when it comes to your D-ring mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Moreno

customer_reviews.title: I love these shackles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shackles because of the product quality GearAmerica provides with their products. They not only matched the color I wanted but saved me from painting some myself so they would match. These are very sturdy and durable. I love that it comes with the rubber to eliminate any noise on the bumper from the shackles. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool shackles.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to need to use them. But, they seem very solid and are thicker than most other shackles. Also, I like the different look these provide over most normal shackles. I just wish "GearAmerica" was made in America.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wrong finish.
customer_reviews.text: Uses a 7/8" pin. Rubber washers work great. "Matt black" is more of a semigloss. I've read that the finish doesn't last, anyway. So, I plan to paint over it.
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: The shackles are extreme duty with a good weight, and come to just as promised "flawless".
customer_reviews.text: The shackles are extreme duty with a good weight, and come to just as promised "flawless"... Great to dress up your mallkrawler, or you weekend warriors. I haven't had an opportunity to put them to the test, but I will do my best to run them through the paces to find the weak point. Keep your posted...
customer_reviews.author: shawn bullock

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my truck!
customer_reviews.text: These came in great packaging. I even kept the box. Seems high quality and the warranty is good. I'll let you know if they are durable when I get stuck in another ditch
customer_reviews.author: WNix

customer_reviews.title: Great company and products
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other stuff from gear America and will be getting more. These are nice and look good on my Jeep. I was really happy to see they donate to children’s hospital. I do recommend if you looking for stuff they sell to go ahead and purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty whitey

customer_reviews.title: Great shackles
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shackles and very heavy duty. This is our second pair. We get compliments and questions of where we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last...
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty great, until they broke! Only had a couple weeks, had one crack, and no before you assume I'm female and hit something, I did not. Maybe the temperature change? Not sure...
customer_reviews.author: Catalina V.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Shackle
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a high quality shackle with a significant towing capacity, probably more than most homeowners need. Haven't needed to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: These D-rings are amazing. Don't buy cheap D-rings! The forces created during a recovery can far exceed the capacity of the cheaper products, then they will break, sending flying parts at you! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Heavy DUTY
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put them to work yet, The finish is amazing and they appear to be as good of quality as you can buy. I will trust them when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They came in very quick, sturdy and clean packaging, and look nice. Haven’t physically used them yet but I know Gear America has sturdy equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered another set. These Shackles are not only good-looking, but built and packaged extremely well. Nice Decal Included for my truck, too! I'm a new GearAmerica Fan! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Worden

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really really cool locking feature to keep people from stealing your d-rings. Nice fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: mtcowboy2000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase and love the color!
customer_reviews.text: They are very strong and come in different colors. The price was better for the durability than other brands which offer colors but are lower rating. The color options could be expanded.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Decent price but paint doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Paint rubbed off and starting to rust on one use. Not a problem if it was black, I would just hit it with a black rattle can but it’s yellow...
customer_reviews.author: Buddyroe3

customer_reviews.title: Solid and High Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. There is no science about installing these, they are sturdy and the finishing is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer UNK

customer_reviews.title: D Ring Shackles Gear America
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shackles. Thought they would be just a little bit bigger in size of the shackle opening but probably not able to and get the strength rating for the size of steel that is used. Works well for my 16K winch which is used with rigging to move a 14K mulcher when It gets stuck (picture show instance that needed right at 40K of pull to get it out using a much lighter weight winch with much more complicated rigging.
customer_reviews.author: Nocef

customer_reviews.title: Waiting pays off!
customer_reviews.text: Once amazon shipping got in order, I received my order and am impressed! A must have for recovery and good looks
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: The color has faded, not even a year old.
customer_reviews.text: The color has faded, not even a year old. Beware if you want to keep the color as it was new
customer_reviews.author: dallas cotts

customer_reviews.title: Great shakle on subaru crosstrek
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, the powder coating on the shake is well done. I had to make some spacers so the shakle didn't rattle
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in as describe condition in typical Amazon 2-day shipping standards. Unboxed and very very impressed with everything. Looks great on my TRD Pro too!
customer_reviews.author: The Reedman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: I just received these, I am looking forward to using them on the trail. I bought blue rings, but I got black bolts with them. Not a big deal, the picture shows blue rings and bolts. So if you read my review, be aware this might happen. After I use these I will update this post, if I remember. *Edit* Added photo
customer_reviews.author: Jed Jannsen

customer_reviews.title: Great company so far
customer_reviews.text: They look great and seem to be good quality. The company also donates to St. Judes with every purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GR8play30

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Prime example of you get what you pay for! Best design, unique look, none tougher. A true stand out in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: Dereklsj

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them.
customer_reviews.text: These were on my husband's wish list ever since he got his new 2019 TRD pro. Got them for him for Christmas and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: JoLyn

customer_reviews.title: Shackles for Pros
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and work perfectly for pulling vehicles out of sticky situations.
customer_reviews.author: David LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Great Rings!
customer_reviews.text: These Rings are beefy, heavy, amazing and look dang cool. Good luck getting other cool colors since they are always out of stock online. Packaging was great and came with rubber washers which eliminated finding right fit online.. amazing addition to my ‘19 runner.
customer_reviews.author: GR57X

customer_reviews.title: Crazy beefy D-rings so strong I'd trust them with my life.
customer_reviews.text: These things are beefy as all heck and look nice. Came with rubber protectors, etc. for protecting bumper and shackle paint when in use. I feel like I could tear my jeep in half before I break one of these shackles.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: The powder coat is great, I love the color and you can feel the quality, not like any other d rings I've ever bought. The different insulators let you keep them isolated depending on what bumpers you're running.
customer_reviews.author: Brian spravka

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Looks cool!
customer_reviews.text: Just put them on so we’ll see how they hold up. Got the ones that have the key. Been nice to have some instructions in the box on how to unlock them. Was able to figure it out but others might struggle. I like you can remove the locking portion when wheeling in case you need to remove a shackle right quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Strength on top of strength
customer_reviews.text: These things are the most overbuilt and robust clevis rings I have ever seen! I have purchased and used this sort of equipment for over 20 years. Have to rate these as the best of all.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Harward

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Finish - Rusted in Less than a Year!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these tow hooks based on beefy design and overall performance. Disappointingly the paint/powder coat didn’t even last thru the first winter. I have used them to two a couple of times but the rust began well before that. Gear America should look into a new process for coating their shackles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grupp

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Shackles
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and finish with several rubber washers to keep a snug and silent fit. The red shackles are a great match for Jeep Rubicon red accents.
customer_reviews.author: Soldots

customer_reviews.title: Beware of defective bolts
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these shackles for my Jeep Rubicon. They are made well, and the spacers that come with them are really nice for creating a snug fit. But one of the four bolts had a defective flange at the bottom of the threads making it impossible to go thru the mount on my bumper. Had to go out and purchase another one. Simple quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coating
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet put them to task seem as sturdy as the normal d rings but look better and have rubber washers to stop rattling
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must !!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product well worth the money if you are every think that you may need to use a shackle don't 2nd guess it . You will never need another one other than this . 👍
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: like insurance against getting stuck
customer_reviews.text: They are deceptively heavy for their size, which is good. Solidly constructed and should last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Very sturdy and nice accent to my wrangler
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: Shackles are made well but not true to color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered red and it has a good bit of orange to it. Not a true red I would have like to kept them but didnt match the other red on my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: winch d rings
customer_reviews.text: BEEFY!! red color is very nice. i doubt that these will EVER break. i recommend!
customer_reviews.author: toddzilla

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: They were nice at first for a few weeks but then they started to get rusty in spots after rain. They were also super hard to screw together. Honestly am looking for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. The added spacers were nice, they don’t slop around like my lad ones which keeps the noise down when going over rough roads.
customer_reviews.author: WADUDE

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great company and love the 10% donation that the company gives on its sales. The product looks great and functions well. Good enough that I have ordered more products from the company and cannot say enough about them!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya J

customer_reviews.title: Crooked Maching.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in a timely manner but machines horribly. The bolt hardly makes it through. The QC could use some work.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Chord

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These shackles are exactly as described and above and beyond expectations! I love the color, design is not like any other I have seen. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Red d rings
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and stylish d ring hooks. Great powder coating and they come with isolators and nylon bushings
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Look great, feel strong. Only worry is the load bearing, but hope never really have to find out!
customer_reviews.author: Fergsgecko

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: If i ever break these, I shouldn't have been doing what I was doing
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with them.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased. They look good and are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jplumbob

customer_reviews.title: This is not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a toy. This is the only hard shackle to use. All the others look very wimpy next to this. Buy the plastic inserts too. They will save your straps and winch ropes. I used it to pull a tree stump, of a blown over tree.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brimley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, excellent delivery time, looks great and a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Friday evening , got delivered Saturday early afternoon, delivery excellent, very happy with this product, looks great and had no problem with the product, would buy it again and I would recommend this product, looks great on my Jeep 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Havili

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the money! Very rugged and look great on my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Best shackles I have ever came across
customer_reviews.text: Love these I just found my new go to shackle company. These are my favorite ones and my go to shackles now I have shackles from a lot of different companies but so far I have now considered them all junk over these
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Winkler

product_meta.title: GearAmerica Mega Shackles Black (2PK) | 68,000 lbs Capacity - Stronger Than 3/4" D Rings | Tow Shackle + 7/8" Pin + Washers | Securely Connect Tow Strap or Winch Rope to 4x4 for Off-Road 4x4 Recovery
feature_bullets: VIRTUALLY UNBREAKABLE - Massive 68,000 LBS Break Capacity (17,000 LBS WLL) will handle any Towing or Recovery job
ULTIMATE CORROSION PROTECTION – With Special Anti-Rust coating and included Washers our Shackles will Outlast any other on the market
MUCH SAFER THAN HOOKS – Quick and Secure Connection for your Recovery Rope, Tree Saver Strap or Snatch Block
MAKE A BOLD STATEMENT - Our Unique Design Ensures Unprecedented Strength and Looks Amazing on your 4x4, Truck, or SUV

LIFETIME GUARANTEE and HELPING CHILDREN IN NEED! All GearAmerica Recovery Products come with a LIFETIME HASSLE FREE REPLACEMENT WARRANTY and we proudly offer 10% of our profits to St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital. Save your vehicle and help kids fight cancer!
